branchItem.name: HRSH090, Large Capacity, High Efficiency Inverter Compact Chiller, 200/400 VAC
branchItem.description: <P>The HRSH090 is a compact chiller with large cooling capacity. A 9.5kW air cooled or 11kW water cooled refrigerating method can be selected. The system is controlled with a triple inverter, offering premium energy savings. Inverter technology allows precise delivery of fan, compressor and pump performance instead of less efficient ON/OFF cycling. The operation interface includes an input keypad and digital display, and an angled fluid supply port with level check. Filter replacement is tool-less for the air cooled model. Power supplies are available in 200 and 400 VAC 3-phase, and function in both 50 and 60 Hz environments for global compatibility. Alarms report on a variety of circuit and equipment conditions to preserve optimal operation.</P>
branchItem.bullets: <UL> <LI>Inverter compressor, fan, and pump for efficient power consumption <LI>Cooling capacity: 9.5kW (Air), 11kW (Water) <LI>Temperature range setting: 5 to 40° C <LI>Temperature stability: ±0.1° C <LI>Standards: CE (400V only), RoHS <LI>Circulating fluid: Tap water, deionized water, or 15% ethylene glycol solution </LI></UL>

branchItem.name: HRSH, Large Capacity, High Efficiency Inverter Chiller, Air-cooled 200VAC
branchItem.description: <p> HRSH Air-cooled recirculating chillers offer a cooling capacity range of 10.5 to 25 kW. Coolant and refrigeration circuits are included in a compact and lightweight package. Extracted heat is air cooled. An inverter provides demand-based rotation control for the compressor, pump and fan, offering substantial energy savings. Electric options ensure global power supply compatibility. Additional features include a heating function, a low-maintenance seal-less immersion pump, and IPX4 rating for outdoor installation.</p>

branchItem.name: HRSH, Large Capacity, High Efficiency Inverter Chiller, Water-cooled 200VAC
branchItem.description: <p>HRSH Water-cooled recirculating chillers offer a cooling capacity range of 11.5 to 24 kW. Coolant and refrigeration circuits are included in a compact and lightweight package. Extracted heat is water cooled. An inverter provides demand-based rotation control for the compressor, pump and fan (air cooled model), offering substantial energy savings. Electric options ensure global power supply compatibility. Additional features include a heating function, a low-maintenance seal-less immersion pump, and IPX4 rating for outdoor installation.</p>
